name: Jewel Match Jam: Pop and blast out 3 gems mania!
name_original: Jewel Match Jam: Pop and blast out 3 gems mania!
description:
Jewel Match is an addictive match 3 puzzle game, to play move the jewels to connect 3 or more of the same type.

Features:
- Fun Challenging Match 3 gameplay
- Beautiful Retina Graphics
- Great Music and Sound Effects
- Lots of Levels to complete
- Special items to make huge combos
- 3 Difficulty settings
- Close any time and resume later

Great time killer for puzzle lovers!

More info at www.boviosoft.com
